Container.Name: opentracker
Container.Overview: Opentracker is a open and free bittorrent tracker. It aims for minimal resource usage and is intended to run at any GNU/Linux system. Currently it is deployed as an open and free tracker instance. First of all, this tracker is compiled to use a hash whitelist, so only hashes stored on whitelist.txt are going to be served.
